paper.title: Volatility Model Based GARCH Minimum Variance Hedging
paper.abstract: In the risk management, volatility as the important parameter for estimation in the issue of hedging. Volatility model is the regression based forecasting model. GARCH (Generalized Autoregressive Conditional Heteroscedasticity) model is one of volatility model, it presents the variance rate at the current time step is a weighted average of a constant long run average variance rate, the variance rate at the previous time steps and the most recent information about the variance rate. Hence, there are many literatures supposed to use the GARCH minimum variance hedging the financial derivatives. Thus, the bivariate GARCH model provides a superior performance to other dynamic or constant hedge for financial derivatives. In the paper, it estimates the minimum variance hedge based on an advanced econometric model (GARCH model) with time varying minimum variance hedge.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论了使用GARCH模型进行最小方差对冲，以管理金融衍生品的风险，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
